title: 160+ Deeply Romantic Love Quotes for Her That Are Straight From The Heart

steps.title: Sweep her off her feet with a love quote that touches her heart.
steps.content: Sweep her off her feet with a love quote that touches her heart. Romance is often overlooked in relationships, but it needs to be a part of your everyday life. [1] X Research source Share one of these love quotes to express how you feel and dial up the romance in your relationship: â€œI wish you to know that you have been the last dream of my soul.â€ â€“ Charles Dickens â€œIf you remember me, then I donâ€™t care if everyone else forgets.â€ â€“ Haruki Murakami â€œI know by experience that the poets are right: love is eternal.â€ â€“ E.M. Forster â€œIf you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.â€ â€“ A.A. Tolkien â€œI love you the way a drowning man loves air. And it would destroy me to have you just a little.â€ â€“ Rae Carson â€œIf you find someone you love in your life, then hand on to that love.â€ â€“ Princess Diana â€œShe knew she loved him when â€˜homeâ€™ went from being a place to being a person.â€ â€“ E. Leventhal â€œI love you, not for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.â€ â€“ Roy Croft. â€œWhen I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.â€ â€“ Arrigo Boito â€œEvery atom of your flesh is as dear to me as my own: in pain and sickness it would still be dear.â€ â€“ Charlotte BrontÃ« â€œMy night has become a sunny dawn because of you.â€ â€“ Ibn Abbad

steps.title: Bare your soul to her with a deep love quote.
steps.content: Bare your soul to her with a deep love quote. Communication is key to any relationship. But that doesnâ€™t mean just talking about what to have for dinner. You have to be able to let her know what youâ€™re feeling deep in your heart. [2] X Research source Try one of these deep love quotes to help her understand what youâ€™re feeling: â€œLove is a quiet, reassuring, relaxing, pottering, pedantic, harmonious hum of a thing; something you can easily forget is there, even though its palms are outstretched beneath you in case you fall.â€ â€“ Dolly Alderton â€œOne day you will ask me which is more importantâ€”my life or yours? I will say mine and you will walk away not knowing that you are my life.â€ â€“ Khalil Gibran â€œTo be fully seen by somebody and then be loved anyhowâ€”this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.â€ â€“ Elizabeth Gilbert â€œLove is a gift of oneâ€™s innermost soul to another so both can be whole.â€ â€“ Buddha â€œBeing deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.â€ â€“ Lao Tzu â€œNobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.â€ â€“ Zelda Fitzgerald â€œLove is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.â€ â€“ Joan Crawford â€œYou donâ€™t love someone because theyâ€™re perfect, you love them in spite of the fact that theyâ€™re not.â€ â€“ Jodi Picoult â€œOf all forms of caution, caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness.â€ â€“ Bertrand Russell â€œWhen someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable.â€ â€“ Jess C. Scott â€œLove doesnâ€™t grow at a steady rate, but advances in surges, bolts, and wild leaps.â€ â€“ Ian McEwan â€œLove does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.â€ â€“ Antoine de Saint-Exupery â€œI swear I couldnâ€™t love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.â€ â€“ Leo Christopher â€œI wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being.â€ â€“ Hafiz of Shiraz â€œAnd I'd choose you; in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds, in any version of reality, I'd find you and I'd choose you.â€ â€“ Kiersten White â€œThe minute I heard my first love story I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.â€ â€“ Rumi

steps.title: Share a love quote that makes her feel all of her feelings.
steps.content: Share a love quote that makes her feel all of her feelings. Sharing one of your favorite quotes might help you tell her how you feel , but what happens if she doesnâ€™t connect with it? When you share a quote, choose one thatâ€™s going to appeal to her tastes and feelings. Here are a few options of quotes she might love: â€œLove is the longing for the half of ourselves we have lost.â€ â€“ Milan Kundera â€œEach time you happen to me all over again.â€ â€“ Edith Wharton â€œOur love cannot be measured, it just is.â€ â€“ John Paul Stevens â€œYou are imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. steps.title: Remind her how adorable you are with a cute love quote.
steps.content: Remind her how adorable you are with a cute love quote. A cute quote is a good way to give her that warm fuzzy feeling. Itâ€™s also perfect for making her think of you and how much fun you have together. steps.title: Send her a funny quote about love to make her laugh.
steps.content: Send her a funny quote about love to make her laugh. Laughter is good for your physical and mental health. Itâ€™s also a fun way to strengthen your bond and ease any conflicts. [4] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source Give her a chuckle with one of these funny love quotes: â€œYou are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever knownâ€”and even that is an understatement.â€ â€“ F. steps.title: Say a lot with only a few words with a short love quote.
steps.content: Say a lot with only a few words with a short love quote. Sometimes, shorter quotes that get right to the point are more powerful than longer, more flowery quotes. These short love quotes are perfect when you want to keep it short and simple: â€œI remember who I am when Iâ€™m with you.â€ â€“ Nicole Christie â€œLove makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.â€ â€“ Zora Neale Hurston â€œLove recognizes no barriers.â€ â€“ Maya Angelou â€œLove is friendship on fire.â€ â€“ Susan Sontag â€œThere is no remedy for love but to love more.â€ â€“ Henry David Thoreau â€œTo live without loving is not really to live.â€ â€“ MoliÃ¨re â€œNever above you. steps.title: Borrow the wit and wisdom of famous people to share your love.
steps.content: Borrow the wit and wisdom of famous people to share your love. Quotes from Shakespeare , Jane Austen, and F. Scott Fitzgerald (and more) all have beautiful and witty things to say about love. Hereâ€™s a list of some of the most meaningful love quotes ever: â€œâ€¦Two souls are sometimes created together and in love before theyâ€™re born.â€ â€“ F. Scott Fitzgerald â€œGrow old along with me; the best is yet to be.â€ â€“ Robert Browning â€œA loving heart is the truest wisdom.â€ â€“ Charles Dickens â€œIn love there are two thingsâ€”bodies and words.â€ â€“ Joyce Carol Oates â€œI have no notion of loving people by halves; it is not my nature.â€ â€“ Jane Austen â€œWe are most alive when we are in love.â€ â€“ John Updike â€œThere is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved. â€“ George Sand â€œI love you with so much of my heart that none is left to protest.â€ â€“ William Shakespeare â€œHave enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.â€ â€“ Maya Angelou â€œThe greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.â€ â€“ Victor Hugo â€How do I love thee? Let me count the ways. I love thee to the depth and breadth and height My soul can reach.â€ â€“ Elizabeth Barrett Browning â€œIn vain have I struggled. It will not do. My feelings will not be repressed. You must allow me to tell you how ardently I admire and love you.â€ â€“ Jane Austen â€Women are meant to be loved, not to be understood.â€ â€“ Oscar Wilde â€œShall I compare thee to a summerâ€™s day? Thou art more lovely and more temperate.â€ â€“ William Shakespeare

steps.title: Turn to love songs to share a heart-touching quote with her.
steps.content: Turn to love songs to share a heart-touching quote with her. What better place to get a sweet quote than a love song? Even better if that song is one of her favorites. But if you donâ€™t know what sheâ€™s listening to right now, here are a few devastatingly romantic quotes from love songs: â€œAnd woman, hold me close to your heart. But above all this, I wish you love.â€ â€“ Dolly Parton, â€œI Will Always Love Youâ€ â€œThe taste of love is sweet when hearts like ours meet.â€ â€“ Johnny Cash, â€œRing of Fireâ€ â€œAnd every time I see you, I tell myself I'll never have this feeling with another. Oh, you're in my heart forever.â€ â€“ Angel Olsen, â€œGive It Upâ€ â€œI need you, darling, like the fish needs the sea.â€ â€“ Janis Joplin, â€œCall on Meâ€ â€œI hope you donâ€™t mind that I put down in words how wonderful life is while youâ€™re in the world.â€ â€“ Elton John, â€œYour Songâ€ â€œYou fill up my senses, like a night in the forest, like the mountains in springtime, like a walk in the rain, like a storm in the desert, like a sleepy blue ocean. You fill up my senses. Come fill me again.â€ â€“ John Denver, â€œAnnieâ€™s Songâ€ â€œWhen a man loves a woman, can't keep his mind on nothin' else.â€ â€“ Percy Sledge, â€œWhen a Man Loves a Womanâ€

steps.title: Write your love message on cute stationary.
steps.content: Write your love message on cute stationary. When you write a love note , what you say in your note is the most important part. Technically, it can be on an old receipt if thatâ€™s what you have. However, putting it on nice stationary or a special note card is a thoughtful touch. Or try getting a little creative with one of these ideas: Sticky notes come in all different sizes and colors. And you can stick them anywhere! Write your note out on a napkin or paper towel and put it in her lunch bag. That way, sheâ€™ll have a nice surprise at lunch time. Write it out on a postcard and send it to her through snail mail. It might take a day or so, but getting a sweet note is way better than bills or junk mail! If sheâ€™s a reader, get a paper bookmark and write your note on the back. Then, slip it into the book sheâ€™s reading.

steps.title: Tell her what you love about her.
steps.content: Tell her what you love about her. â€œI would definitely start by writing about what you love about your partner and why,â€ suggests Beck. Make a list of everything you love about her. Then, use that as inspiration for your note. â€œDescribe the qualities that make them special to youâ€¦ the qualities that actually touch your heartâ€¦ It can even be quirky, cute things about them,â€ explains Beck. Another option is to make a list of your feelings and let that be in your note. Elizabeth Barrett Browning took this approach and created one of the most famous love poems of all time.

steps.title: Let her know how sheâ€™s changed your life.
steps.content: Let her know how sheâ€™s changed your life. â€œDefinitely tell them what they mean to you. And how their love has changed your life for the better,â€ Beck recommends. Think about what your life was like before you met her and how itâ€™s different now. Do you laugh and smile more? Are you happier than youâ€™ve ever been? Are you inspired to try new things? Tell her about it! According to Beck, itâ€™s a good idea to â€œshare one of your favorite memories with them. Or maybe a very simple moment that really touched your heart, but you never told them.â€ One example would be to say something like, â€œOne day when we were eating ice cream, you didnâ€™t notice you got some on your nose. I just knew. Youâ€™re the one for me.â€

steps.title: Put your message where sheâ€™ll find it.
steps.content: Put your message where sheâ€™ll find it. You can tuck your note in a card and hand it directly to her. Thatâ€™s a perfectly acceptable approach that wonâ€™t take away from the feelings you share. However, leaving the note somewhere for her to find gives her a delightful surprise as she goes about her day. Think about her routine and place the note where sheâ€™s sure to see it. Put the note on her bathroom mirror where sheâ€™ll see it first thing in the morning. If you have a set of keys to her car, place it on her seat where sheâ€™ll find it when she goes to work.
